title: "Squirrel Fight Club" - Running a Session Zero
itunes:title: "Squirrel Fight Club" - Running a Session Zero
description:
Starting a new campaign soon? Well, you're in luck! This week the Halflings are discussing all things Session Zero. We'll be sharing the points we usually cover in our own and discuss some ideas you might want to bring to your next Session Zero before embarking on your adventure.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
